definition: cashier/to receive and hand over payment/to lend and borrow books

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
surname Na
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
cashier/teller/treasurer

sentences.english: For assistance please call the Library Circulation Desk at extension 15112.
sentences.chinese: 若有疑問歡迎洽詢圖書館出納臺，分機15112。

sentences.english: And when I said hello to cashiers and clerks, I got better service.
sentences.chinese: 當我向出納員或店員問好時，能得到更優質的服務。

sentences.english: Collect bills from travel services and hand the payment to the teller.
sentences.chinese: 負責與旅行社的結帳工作，收款後交於出納。

sentences.english: The teller then takes the withdrawal slip to a bank officer for approval.
sentences.chinese: 然後出納員將此取款單交給銀行主管人以獲得批准。

sentences.english: After robbing the till for months the cashier was found out.
sentences.chinese: 那出納員從錢櫃裏偷錢偷了好幾個月後才被發現。

sentences.english: Since my graduation from the school two years ago, I ahve been employed in the Green Hotel as a cashier.
sentences.chinese: 兩年前，自從離校後，在格蘭酒店擔任出納員。

sentences.english: Mary Ann, his wife, passed by with her bookkeeping binder.
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子瑪麗安捧着出納簿從邊上走過。

sentences.english: Salaries were disbursed by the paymaster's office.
sentences.chinese: 薪金已由工薪出納員辦公室發放。

sentences.english: There's a partial list over by the cash register .
sentences.chinese: 現金出納機旁邊有張部分的進貨單。

sentences.english: Qiu Renqing, specialized accountant, presently is responsible for QIANYIl tellers work.
sentences.chinese: 邱仁慶，專業會計師，現負責千藝出納工作。

sentences.english: The letter at Counter 6will pay you against your number slip.
sentences.chinese: 六號欄櫃的出納員將根據你的號頭牌給付你錢。

sentences.english: The diligent sayer talked a tedious story about the insayigent sasayite.
sentences.chinese: 勤奮的出納講述了唯一涉及智能衛星的乏味古代事件。

sentences.english: The teller told me I need to sign these forms.
sentences.chinese: 出納員告訴我得籤這些表格。

sentences.english: The company treasurer absconded with the funds.
Be responsible for maintaining enough coins and bank notes for cashiers' daily exchange.
sentences.chinese: 爲出納準備足夠的硬幣和小鈔以便每日的兌換。

sentences.english: Cashier was found guilty of peculation and removed from his post.
sentences.chinese: 出納員被發現犯了盜用公款罪便被解除了職務。

definition: my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
title (position within an organization)
argumentation
scholastic attainments
to be in overall charge/to oversee
to reconcile/to mediate/to bring warring parties to agreement/to arbitrate
to denounce/to condemn/to call to account/to punish
experienced/sophisticated/worldly-wise
(grammar) number plus classifier/household (in census)
see 報應|报应[bao4 ying4]
high official
funds and provisions for the troops/(soldier's) pay
to evaluate the merit of sth
plan of convenience (idiom); stop-gap measure/makeshift stratagem/interim step
to investigate/examination
to become visible/to appear/to manifest one's true nature
